snippet: GUSTIN--Brenda. Hard to imagine we lost this beautiful woman one year ago on February 7. We love and miss you every day Mom. "You are the light that shines on me. You always were and you'll always be." Nick Gustin Ken Gustin 1/3
lead_paragraph: GUSTIN--Brenda. Hard to imagine we lost this beautiful woman one year ago on February 7. We love and miss you every day Mom. "You are the light that shines on me. You always were and you'll always be." Nick Gustin Ken Gustin 1/3
